entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 11:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: 9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 8.6°C
Wind: ESE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
